Hello,
It is indeed a great pleasure to start communication with you. We are a premium marketing organisation in India and our work is oriented on various segments especially in education sectors. However, We find a opportunity to grow further with respect to Smart boards and Panels segments. Recently, Our management has decided to have our own name branded smart boards and panels with the help of your esteemed company and to sell in different parts of the country.

name: KAVA247 TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Must Heal, a fast-upcoming medical partner to fulfill all the present generation needs in
medicines, first aid and travel aids. The scenario of lack of awareness among people regarding first
aid and its necessity brought the young pharmacy post-graduates in this field. We feel pharmacists
should play a critical role in improving the current state of healthcare in our country. First aid is a
concept which exists from a very long time but it is not taken seriously or rather neglected by many
due to lack of understanding and awareness. Even though the first aid is available at some places
but it is not utilized properly.
We believe that many lives are saved when first aid is given in the right manner and at the
right time, hence we have taken the responsibility to install, maintain and improve the perception
about first aid kits. By following the recommendations on first aid kit by the World Health
Organization (WHO) and National health portal, India, we have designed range of first aid kits and
boxes which are portable, durable and user friendly with our maintenance service makes you always
prepared for any mishaps.
name: MUST HEAL
